item.description:
Host: Claire P   cell # 603-247-0897.  Call 603-465-7787 to pre register. You must pre-register to ensure a spot on the hike.

This event sounds like fun, so I thought I would post it. Won’t you join me?

Event Info

Name:Full Moon Snowshoe Hike

Date:02/04/2012 to 02/04/2012

Time:7:00 PM - 9:00 PM

Cost:$10 (includes snowshoe rental)

Days: Sat

Venue:Beaver Brook Association

Address:117 Ridge Road Hollis, NH

Phone:Celeste Barr, (603) 465-7787

Email:cdpocklington@bbanaturecenter.org

Website:Beaver Brook

Join a fun group of adventurers to break out into the bright white world of a full moon winter night to hear and smell what is going on in the winter woods.  A fun experience for those who can walk for up to 2 hours at a moderate to moderately slow pace.  Dress in layers.
$10 per person includes snowshoes or crampons.  We will return inside for tea, cocoa & cookies afterwards.
Call to pre-register 603-465-7787.

Liability Release - AS A CONDITION OF ATTENDING THIS MEETUP, YOU AGREE TO hold harmless, and indemnify the organizer and her heirs, and all members and participants of this Meetup group from any and all claims for injury, illness, death, and/or property damage including those caused by negligence, ignorance, inexperience and other reasons. You also agree to assume all mental, physical, financial, and/or other risk associated with this meetup. All  meetup activities pose inherent risks and dangers. Participation in these activities is voluntary and dependent upon your own personal judgment.
item.name: Full Moon Snowshoe or Hike at Beaver Brook in Hollis NH
